name: Patrick BROWN, Petitioner, v. Robert FOSTER, a.d.a., Harold M. Kane, Respondents

parties: Patrick BROWN, Petitioner, v. Robert FOSTER, a.d.a., Harold M. Kane, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of August, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED. The Prothonotary is directed to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
52 A.3d 1200
Patrick BROWN, Petitioner, v. Robert FOSTER, a.d.a., Harold M. Kane, Respondents.
No. 97 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 23, 2012.
